title: TCT Clip: Why did Omar Mohammed decide to resist ISIS and create Mosul Eye?
description:
Omar Mohammed, creator of Mosul Eye, reveals the reason behind his dangerous decision to resist the occupation of ISIS in his city and publish its brutal reality for the world to read.

Full conversation:

https://www.thecommontoad.com/post/conversations-omar-mohammed-mosul-eye-forgetting-is-a-crime
